trans-unit.source: This book has audio recordings. Bloom can use these to make a "Talking Book" e-book. However, Bloom needs a program called "LAME for Audacity" in order to create the mp3 files that the book will use. Setting it up is easy. First download and run 'Lame_v3.99 for Windows.exe'. Next, restart Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kina sauti zilizorekodiwa. Bloom inaweza kutumia hizi kutengeneza e-book ya "Kitabu kilicho na sauti". Hata hivyo, Bloom huhitaji programu iitwayo "LAME for Audacity" ili kutengeneza faili za MP3 zitakazotumiwa na kitabu. Ni rahisi kuiweka. Kwanza ipakue kisha uifungue 'Lame_v3.99 for Windows.exe'. Kisha, fungua upya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: If you prefer to go ahead and publish your book without audio, click here.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo unapendelea kuendelea na kuchapisha kitabu chako bila sauti, bofya hapa.
